# Getting Started

Welcome to the memory system. This guide covers initial setup and usage.

## Installation

Install the package using pip. Configuration is automatic for most environments.
The system creates a local SQLite database for memory storage.

## First Steps

Start by running the load command to initialize your memory context.
Create episodes to record significant experiences and their outcomes.
Use raw capture for quick unstructured notes during active work.

## Best Practices

Always save a checkpoint before ending a session to preserve state.
Record lessons learned from each significant experience.
Review and consolidate memories periodically to build stronger beliefs.
